    def __init__(self, header_rows=None):
        super().__init__(delimiter_pad=None, bookend=False, header_rows=header_rows)

    def write(self, lines):
        lines = super().write(lines)
        lines = [lines[1]] + lines + [lines[1]]
        return lines
